data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, A. J., Okuno, J., Li, Xinzheng (2005): Manipontonia gen. nov., a new pontoniine shrimp genus for Periclimenes psamathe (De Man) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae). Zootaxa 926: 1-11, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171104
